post.body: It's definitely a very real possibility that this is the cycle that ends all cycles as far as old ways of thinking about $
Glad you liked the post!
Thx 4 the article! I liked the part about how letting go of old ways will be one of the crucial steps towards transformation
Agreed!
Thanks--feel free to comment on the posts. The more voices in the discussion the better.
LOL Good point!
Dark flow and theories of the unseen multiverse http://tinyurl.com/6zp7a5 by @billmachon
"Reuniting the Self: Autoimmunity, Obesity, and the Ecology of Health" by Charles Eisenstein: http://tinyurl.com/5ng74g
C. Eisenstein piece argues that "The twin epidemics of our time-obesity& autoimmunity-are symptoms of a deep infirmity in our civilization."
"Toward a New Economic Order": RS feature article brainstorms new ideas about money: http://tinyurl.com/5fdsfr
Is the current financial system being demolished to make way for another that will further enhance the power and wealth of the few?
"The Value of Solitude": http://tinyurl.com/5g2x5v
A big shout out to all new followers! Please @realitysandwich with questions, comments, revelations and exclamations :)
"Will the Real Ayahuasca Tourists Please Stand Up?": an RS feature about psychedelics & enlightenment: http://tinyurl.com/5qw67f
The conversation about Ayahuasca tourism is a cloaked conversation about what constitutes a reverent vs recreational psychedelic experience.
"Magic: It's More Than Just Finding Parking Spaces": RS contributor debunks negative stereotypes about magic: http://tinyurl.com/59faft
The most important part of yoga practice may happen 3 times a day when you sit down to eat--Yoga & Vegetarianism: http://tinyurl.com/5e5jv9
Check out "Entheogenic Spirituality as a Human Right": http://tinyurl.com/6a99op Please drop a comment and join in the discussion.
"Something missing from our legal protections is any recognition of direct spiritual experience itself, including with sacred plants."
Check out "Building with a Blue-Eyed Devil" by Propaganda Anonymous: http://tinyurl.com/57porr
Author Michael Muhammad Knight talks 2 RS about the shared roots of Hip-Hop &American Islam, The 5 Percenter movement &being a white Muslim
"Catching the Bug of Synchronicity": http://tinyurl.com/6jd6rc
"How can we in the 'developed' world drastically reduce our consumption?": "The Arithmetic of Compassion": http://tinyurl.com/6kyra7
What if there was a license for exploring your mind? "A Psychonaut License: The Psychedelic University" http://tinyurl.com/6crgbf
RT @dpinchbeck please check out my new essay and the comments after it: http://tinyurl.com/5gtbm4 - what do you think?
"Following Footsteps: A Journey into the Nomadic Heart": RS interview with director of documentary on the Tuareg: http://tinyurl.com/66wj9f
"For many thousands of years, a nomadic people known as the Tuareg have carved out an austere existence in northern Africa’s Sahara desert."
DJ Spooky asks RS readers to host a screening of his new film in their hometown: http://tinyurl.com/5zzl8h
"Is God Expensive?" RS writer examines the amount he is willing to pay for spiritual enlightenment: http://tinyurl.com/64eoxv
Could open source, peer-to-peer distributed methods be the basis of our next economy? http://tinyurl.com/5j43xg
The 1st RS anthology--Toward 2012: Perspectives on the Next Age--is available 4 pre-order on Amazon! : http://tinyurl.com/5d8p3y
Can boredom be used as a gateway to pure awareness? http://tinyurl.com/5sz2ph
"There is, in a sense, no such thing as boredom. Boredom is only another name for a certain species of frustration." -- Susan Sontag
Please read and comment on "Psychedelic Healing" : http://tinyurl.com/5qcl7o (thanks!)
Researchers hit the lab hoping 2 use psychedelics 2 treat chronic depression, post traumatic stress disorder &drug & alcohol dependency...
Van Jones-prez of Green 4 All-talks about providing America’s poor with “green jobs instead of jails”: http://tinyurl.com/8n9wqu
I'm sure the real dood would appreciate Fake Terrence McKenna on Twitter! @timewavezero
2 part article on RS about astral portals w/in THC crystals in marijuana has instigatd a lively discussion: http://tinyurl.com/823xns (pt 1)
RS author realizes it's not enough to detoxify the body--one must also detox the imagination: "Imaginal Hygiene": http://tinyurl.com/75739y
“Imagination lays the tracks for the reality train to follow.”-Caroline W. Casey, Visionary Activist Astrologer
Web Prophecy--so far the predictions of the web bot have been remarkably accurate: http://www.realitysandwich.com/node/10212
The Web Bot Project predicts a string of escalating world events leading up to and culminating on the winter solstice in 2012...
